segments.text: I am so angry at how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, letting the water overflow like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and no one is stopping them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how irresponsible this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the floor, and she’s still just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and take control before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get hurt, and the woman is going to have a huge mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can’t stand seeing this kind of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is absolutely infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
